title: Pattern Recognition
key_events: Adrian stays home from work, obsessed with wall patterns
Discovers patterns aren't static - they shift meaning
Listens to Voyager signal repeatedly, enters trance states
Lena visits after Dr. Patterson calls her
Lena sees the walls, believes Adrian is having psychotic break
Adrian pushes Lena away, compares to her father's schizophrenia
Adrian begins searching online for others experiencing similar symptoms

character_development.Adrian: Enhanced pattern recognition developing, emotional responses beginning to flatten, choosing obsession over human connection
character_development.Lena: Trauma triggered by seeing Adrian's symptoms, tries to help but is pushed away

planted_elements: Lena's father's schizophrenia mentioned - will payoff in Ch37
Adrian finding others online - leads to meeting the Changed in Ch5
Emotional flattening beginning - progresses through Stage 2
transformation_stage: Stage 1 - Enhanced pattern recognition, beginning personality changes
cosmic_horror_elements: Patterns that shift meaning when not observed
Trance states where time becomes uncertain
Loss of emotional response presented as relief
The seductive nature of understanding over humanity
